title: This pretty much says everything you need to know on how to beat Yasuo.
body:
[](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Yasuo_0.jpg)

Everything you need to know on how to beat Yasuo.

replies.body: _slow clap_
I feel bad for making this post.
It's M&G. If you feel bad about making a post, you're doing it right.
Ty babes <3

> [{quoted}](name=Sexualsaurus,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=1FeEHkZK,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-29T03:21:09.459+0000)
>
> I feel bad for making this post.

you should{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
It is bad and you should feel bad.
Note to self: check the boards that posts are in before clicking on them
https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RzInB8D21GY/Vvtm0XUEyyI/AAAAAAAAS5o/iwkxw6N4FpUa1ftFDR9XYV1i1eyGkWh8Q/s640/tumblr_nhsttndz4c1t329aoo1_500.gif
http://38.media.tumblr.com/5040c39dcbd6facd162a9794a7a5272e/tumblr_mqfn00uVgk1s15ve0o3_250.gif
If you really came here for advice against yasuo and you are reading this,check out Dong huap's video about yas
Doug? Who's Doug? I think you mean Dong Huap. ;)
yep indeed,gonna edit that haha,thanks mate

What a shame. Dong Huap's lesser known brother, Doug Huap, also makes League videos too on a different site. He doesn't get nearly as many views, but his content is on-par with Dong's. I guess he's just not as charismatic, but he really puts forth his best in his videos. Uploads on Doug Huap's channel aren't as common as on Dong Huap's, but he spends a lot of time editing them. He really tries his best.
I thought you were giving some him recognition for once.
Haha nice one.
Np m8.
https://dataportdoll.files.wordpress.com/2015/11/vwkbugp.gif?w=664&h=373

> [{quoted}](name=Sexualsaurus,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=1FeEHkZK,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-01-29T03:13:19.641+0000)

You know too much.

Play Teemo? Gotchu fam
What are you talking about? This is definitely Evelynn!
No, it's Urgot. Because I don't see him at all anyways.
No it can't be Eve, we'd see her once we were in range.
what im seeing is a Vayne using Q during ult, u sure its teemo?
spaghetti code yasuo Q says hi
So you are saying you don't need to know anything in order to beat Yasuo? As a player of Riven and Poppy I agree.
https://media0.giphy.com/media/URmJvPe1VXIUE/200.gif#36
nocturne and full ad garen do pretty damn well against him, just dont fight him near your minions EVER. your minions are not your friends which is some backward design by riot

What you need to know on how to beat Yasuo as a Zed main?

Nothing, nothing at all. Just a specialized combo, keeping track of a million things at the same time, and a _fucking specialized build just for beating this guy_

Nope, nothing at all.
Well played
yep that pretty much sums it up.
I applaud you sir
So Yasuo is so easily beaten you don't need to know anything?
